about.name: Ben Gundersen
about.title: Digital Product Development
about.bio:
I bridge the gap between technical implementation and user experience, building products that solve real problems at scale. With a background in both engineering and product management, I bring a unique perspective to creating elegant, performant solutions.

I also publish a weekly newsletter sharing creative work opportunities around art, design, technology, and mental health.

projects.title: Tripadvisor: Trust & Safety Technical Management
projects.long_description:
As Technical Manager for Trust & Safety at Tripadvisor, I led engineering efforts for content moderation pipelines, fraud detection, and tooling.

  • Delivered scalable data pipelines for content and user analysis
  • Worked cross-functionally with Product and Operations
  • Drove roadmapping and technical strategy for key initiatives

projects.title: Afterwork: Social Tools for the Loneliness Epidemic
projects.description: Afterwork is a network of in-person gatherings, service opportunities and personal development strategies, all centered around the shared experience of midlife.
projects.long_description:
Afterwork creates scalable solutions to address loneliness and foster community for adults.

  • Co-founded and led product development
  • Launched AI-driven personal development engines
  • Built and marketed a community platform blending events, services, and content

projects.title: Citymaps: Mapping the World's Places
projects.description: Building a map of the world's places. Acquired by Tripadvisor in 2016.
projects.long_description:
As a founding team member at Citymaps, I helped build a unique crowdsourced mapping platform.

  • Architected interactive map UI and data models using React
  • Scaled platform to millions of places globally
  • Contributed to successful acquisition by Tripadvisor in 2016

projects.title: Free Gaza Circus
projects.description: Website and digital marketing support for Palestine-based nonprofit.
projects.long_description:
Free Gaza Circus is a Palestine-based nonprofit circus school providing performances, workshops, and a sense of purpose and activism.

  • Pro bono support for the Squarespace web presence.

projects.title: Excel Sports: NCAA Officiating Partner
projects.description: Partnered with NCAA to improve officiating efficiency and transparency.
projects.long_description:
Led engineering for an NCAA officiating technology platform.

  • Designed secure systems for game oversight
  • Built reporting and analysis tools (using .NET stack)
  • Collaborated with NCAA and Excel Sports leadership for process improvement

projects.title: Envison Gaming: Creative Direction
projects.long_description:
Creative lead at Envision Gaming, a hardware and software casino product startup.

  • Directed 3D CAD design for consumer hardware
  • Oversaw prototyping and industrial design
  • Launched MVP and mobile applications on a limited team
